what: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network
title: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network
text: purpose blueskynet provide tools generate analyze networks Bluesky Social

title: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network
text: can install development version blueskynet like :

title: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network
text: First, create app password : https://bsky.app/settings/app-passwords. , set environment variable BLUESKY_APP_PASS app password, another variable, BLUESKY_APP_USER, identifier (e.g. “lassehjorthmadsen.bsky.social”) using file.edit("~/.Renviron") Now, can access core function blueskynet: First rows starting point initial network: can expand net, using expand_net() won’t run , since can take lot time build big network.
code: library(blueskynet) library(dplyr)  # Authenticate yourself password <- Sys.getenv("BLUESKY_APP_PASS") identifier <- Sys.getenv("BLUESKY_APP_USER") auth_object <- get_token(identifier, password) token <- auth_object$accessJwt refresh_tok <- auth_object$refreshJwt  # Establish a small net as a starting point key_actor <- "natalieamiri.bsky.social" keywords <- c("reporter", "journalist", "writer") small_net <- init_net(key_actor, keywords, token) small_net |> head(3) #> # A tibble: 3 × 2 #>   actor_handle             follows_handle             #>   <chr>                    <chr>                      #> 1 natalieamiri.bsky.social dunjahayali.de             #> 2 natalieamiri.bsky.social spiegelmagazin.bsky.social #> 3 natalieamiri.bsky.social gildasahebi.bsky.social

title: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network

what: blueskynet: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network — blueskynet-package
title: blueskynet: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network — blueskynet-package
text: Tools generating analyzing networks Bluesky Social. Based given actor (user) Bluesky, can generate network based users actor followes. Outputs graph information follows among set actors, dataset metadata actors. Also included tools `igraph` `tidygraph` network analysis.

title: blueskynet: Analyze Networks on the Bluesky Social Network — blueskynet-package

Expand network — expand_net
Expand network — expand_net
code: expand_net(   net,   keywords,   token,   refresh_tok,   save_net = FALSE,   file_name = paste0("dev/net/big_net_", Sys.Date(), ".rds"),   threshold = 30,   max_iterations = 50,   sample_size = Inf )

title: Expand network — expand_net
text: net tibble network connections (edges). Assumed contain two columns: actor_handle (Blue Sky Social actor followING another) follows_handle (actor followed). keywords character vector keywords check actors' description determine belong expanded network token character, token Blue Sky Social API refresh_tok character, refresh token Blue Sky Social API save_net boolean, net saved incrementally expanded? Useful losing work case unexpected interruptions. Defaults FALSE file_name character, file name saved net. Defaults 'dev/net/bignet_TIMESTAMP.rds' threshold numeric, threshold including actors expansion: many followers must prospect , considered? less 1, interpreted fraction current net prospects must followed , considered. Defaults 30. max_iterations integer, maximum iterations network expansion. Defaults 50 sample_size integer, want expand sample prospects; can useful testing purposes. Defaults `Inf´, e.g. every worthy prospect included expansion

title: Expand network — expand_net

title: Word frequencies — word_freqs
text: texts character. Vector texts (like profile descriptions) bigrams boolean. count bigrams? Default FALSE top integer. top words/bi-grams include. Defaults 30 remove_stopwords boolean. stopwords excluded? Defaults TRUE language character. language use removing stopwords. Defaults "en"
